title: Cant find people
body: Hey guys so recently a friend of mine has joined the rift but whenever I try to find him on the servers it says the player doesnt exist. His on NA servers and hes sent me screenshots of his summoner, He currently level 3 but no one can find him. Solutions??

replies.body: That's a weird situation, and the only thing I can think of is you guys being on different regions.  Are you absolutely certain he is on NA?  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can help out individually without sharing public info here on the boards.  We'll assist asap!
